Ahead DVD to iPod MP4 3GP PSP FLV RM v2.1.1

HomePage: http://www.aheaddvd.com/aheaddvdtoipod.htm


Ahead DVD to iPod MP4 3GP PSP FLV RM is a small tool that allow you backup DVD to iPod, mp4, 3gp, psp, flv, rm, mov. It produces good quality movies to play on your mobile phone, iPod, PSP.
Ahead DVD to iPod MP4 3GP PSP FLV RM supports charpter encode mode so you can split or rip DVD by charpters in one or several files. You can also split the movie by time. After setting the start and stop time position, it will start and stop conversion between the time that you want.
Ahead DVD to iPod MP4 3GP PSP FLV RM has been designed especialy for inexperienced users, it is a simple and easy program. In the wizzard mode, you will really find it just takes three steps clicks to accomplish all the job


Features included:
===================
-Convert DVD to to mp4 format
-Convert DVD to iPod compatible mp4 file
-Convert DVD to 3GP
-Convert DVD to PSP compatible mp4 file
-Convert DVD to iPhone compatible mp4 file
-Convert DVD to MOV (QuickTime)
-Convert DVD to Flash Video
-Convert DVD to RM (RealMedia)
-Rip and split DVD by chapter
-Rip and split DVD by play time
-Set video resolution and aspect ratio
-Set video frame rate, audio/video bitrate
-Automatically authorize driver
-Automatically shut down computer after all jobs are done


System requirement:
====================
-Microsoft Win98/Me/2000/2003/XP/Vista
-DirectX 8.1 or higher
-5MB Hard disk space for install
-Pentium Processor or better
-128MB RAM or more
-Adaptec ASPI driver
